review: Doctor is very friendly and explained the condition and what should be the next course of action, she also suggested further tests that may be nessesary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Manjula was very rude *** ************* While I told her the issues I have I told her to have a look as I was not sure what’s going on. It was my first experience to a gynaecologist and as a 19 year old I was a little awkward but the moment I told that I have had sex I felt like I was in moral science class. I wouldn’t really recommend her.
